name: gossa
description: Gossa is a fast self-hosted file sharing application. It supports drag-and-drop uploads, directory browsing, public links, and real-time change detection through a clean web UI. Designed for easy file hosting and sharing.
features: Drag-and-Drop Uploads: Upload files by dragging them directly into the browser interface.
Directory Browsing: Navigate folder structures with a clean, file-explorer-style interface.
Real-Time Updates: Automatically detect and display file system changes without page refresh.
Public Link Sharing: Generate shareable links for files and folders with optional access controls.
Fast Performance: Lightweight Go-based server with minimal overhead and quick response times.
File Preview: View images, videos, and documents directly in the browser.
Search Functionality: Quickly find files across your hosted directories.
Simple Deployment: Single binary with no database requirements for easy setup.
